journey.header: My BRP has not been delivered

about-error.header: Tell us about the error on your BRP
about-error.subheader: You can select one or more options if needed.

contact-details.subheader: We need your contact details to reply to your enquiry about why you have not received a BRP.

address.title: Please provide your address so that we contact you by post

same-address.header: Is your address the same as on the Home Office letter saying your application to remain in the UK was successful?

personal-details.subheader: Complete this section carefully as these details will help us to find your information.

check-details.subheader: Check through the information that you have provided to make sure it is correct. If it is incorrect you can change it here.

org-help.title: Have you had help from an organisation to fill in this form?
org-help.explanation: This could be help from your immigration lawyer or representative, or a charity, employer, college or university.

footer.title: Send your submission
footer.explanation: By sending us your details you confirm that the information you have provided is true and that you accept our terms and conditions and privacy policy.hared with other government departments.

check-details-error.subheader: Check through the information that you have provided to make sure it is correct. If it is still incorrect you can change it here.

footer.title: Send your submission
footer.explanation: By sending us your details you confirm that the information you have provided is true and that you accept our terms and conditions and privacy policy.hared with other government departments.

date-lost.header: When did you realise you no longer had your BRP?

confirmation.header: Thank you, we have received the information you have provided. We are now looking into this.
confirmation.privacy: We keep your personal data secure according to our privacy policy.
confirmation.email: We have sent you an email containing the information you have provided to

para.one: We will now review the information you provided to find out why you have not received the biometric residence permit.
para.two: We will get back to you within 5 working days. For example, if you contact us on a Monday you will hear back by the following Monday.
para.three: We will then advise you what to do next.

para.one: You should hear from us in the next working day, where we will advise you what to do.
para.two: You may need to apply for a replacement biometric residence permit.

para.one: You should hear from us in the next working day, where we will advise you what to do.
para.two: As you are outside the UK you may need to apply for a temporary ‘replacement BRP visa’ which you can use once to re-enter the UK. A replacement BRP visa costs £72.
para.three: You must apply online for a replacement BRP visa in most countries. https://www.gov.uk/apply-uk-visa.
para.four: When you are back in UK you should then apply for a replacement BRP within 1 month.

letter-received.header: Have you received a letter from the Home Office telling you your biometrics residence permit was being delivered to you by a courier?

list.one: your biometric residence permit (BRP) is going to be delivered
list.two: your application to stay in the UK was successful

letter-received.date-question: What is the date on the letter?

para.one: If you haven't received a letter from the Home Office saying your application to remain in the UK was successful it may mean a decision about your application to stay in the UK has not been made yet. Meaning a biometric residence permit would not have been sent out.
para.two: Call the contact centre 0300 123 2241 or email them at mail@contact-centre.co.uk.
